--- Created by pengzhou.
--- DateTime: 2019-09-26 15:56
---

--- @param data PsBattleDragonInfo
function init(self, data)
    -- local dragonId = "5001";
    -- local dragonStar = 3;
    -- local dragonLevel = 30;



    if data == nil then
        -- body
        return;
    end

    local dragonId = data.MetaId;
    local dragonStar = data.Rank;
    local dragonLevel = data.Level;
    local meta = CS.DragonMeta.GetMeta(dragonId)

    if meta ~= nil then
        local icon1 = CS.MultipleAtlasSpriteWrapper(self.icon, CS.AtlasNameConst.ICON01, CS.AtlasNameConst.ICON02, CS.AtlasNameConst.ICON03)
        icon1.spriteName = CS.DragonUtils.GetDragonIcon(meta, dragonStar);
        self.iconBG.spriteName = CS.DragonUtils.GetDragonKuangQuality(meta);
    end
    
    self.dragonLevel.text = tostring(dragonLevel);
    local star = {self.star1,self.star2,self.star3,self.star4,self.star5}

    for i = 1, #star do
        star[i].gameObject:SetActive(i <= dragonStar)
    end
    
    self.group:Reposition();
end
